sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button>{{ title }}</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props:{
        title: {
            type: String,
            required: true
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
button{
    border: none;
    background-color: #5D3FD3;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    height: 60px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 100px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
    opacity: 0.7;

}
button:hover{
    opacity: 1;

}
</style>
